name: email.validation.resend
subject: Verify your email address at %domain.name%
body:
Hi %user.firstName% %user.lastNamePrefix% %user.lastName%,

You have requested that we resend you an e-mail validation token. Please validate your email address for %domain.name% by clicking on %email.validate.url%.

placeholders.name: %email.validate.url%
placeholders.description: A link which the player clicks on to validate his/her email address
